Online Appendix for Ã¢â¬ÅThe Term Structure of Currency Carry Trade Risk PremiaÃ¢â¬Â Ã¢â¬âNot For PublicationÃ¢â¬â Section A reports the proofs of the theoretical results presented in the main text. The decomposition of the SDF in two affine term structure models is reported in Section B. Additional empirical results on the cross-section of currency and risk premia are given in Section C.
